channel.title: Help with compiling please
channel.description: Ok so I did everything right to compile...followed every step of the tutorial of how to make server, it shows you how to compile I did exactly what it says but it still gives me an error what do you thing the problem is? :S and I'm using JDK6 Update 5 it says update 1 and 2 in tutorial is update 5 still good?... heres the pics:

item.title: Help with compiling please
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“zubmage, post:10, topic:195992”][quote author=eczema3 link=topic=260547.msg2160602#msg2160602 date=1207367600]

Replace compiler with this:

@echo off title Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_5\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

I’m afraid that will do a wrse job than what i posted, I posteda section of batch script that will locate the Javac file if the variables are correct, yours just looks in the \jdk1.5.0_5\ directory.
[/quote]
I see,
I just copied his compiler and changed the JDK for him.[/quote]
If this doesnt work:
@echo off
javac *.java
pause

Then he will need to either re-install JDK or reveiw his variables.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with compiling please

item.description:
@Jjamess123 wrote:

I’m gonna delete JDK and download it and install it again and I’ll see if it works :S
